body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack compiler find --scope=site  # use the Ubuntu 20.04 system gcc but not non-compiler system packages
$ spack install openmpi%gcc@9.3.0 arch=linux-ubuntu20.04-broadwell
```

However, compiling for `skylake` succeeds.

### Information on your system

```
$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.16.3-4468-ee63cfe0fd
* **Python:** 3.8.10
* **Platform:** linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake
* **Concretizer:** clingo
```

Note: the build fails similarly on an actual pre-Skylake Broadwell CPU as well.   (I'm using a skylake machine here for faster compiling and to demonstrate that it's a broadwell-specific issue.)

### Additional information

cc maintainers @hppritcha  @naughtont3

tail of `spack-build-out.txt`:

```
Making all in monitoring
make[2]: Entering directory '/tmp/micedev/spack-stage/spack-stage-openmpi-4.1.1-rp4ei5mvrbd7ccf3sfqryf6r7y6eiyef/spack-src/test/monitoring'
depbase=`echo monitoring_test.o | sed 's|[^/]*$|.deps/&|;s|\.o$||'`;\
/projects/tools/programs/ubuntu-20.04/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/gcc -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -I. -I../../opal/include -I../../ompi/include -I../../oshmem/include -I../../opal/mca/hwloc/hwloc201/hwloc/include/private/autogen -I../../opal/mca/hwloc/hwloc201/hwloc/include/hwloc/autogen -I../../ompi/mpiext/cuda/c   -I../.. -I../../orte/include   -I/projects/tools/programs/ubuntu-20.04/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-broadwell/gcc-9.3.0/zlib-1.2.11-cvyc3qqfhojs42texnulwmarnnkyjdvc/include   -I/projects/tools/programs/ubuntu-20.04/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-broadwell/gcc-9.3.0/hwloc-2.5.0-mgf2pgiusiwz5xzwqpqctlqwowwj6awq/include  -I/projects/tools/programs/ubuntu-20.04/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-broadwell/gcc-9.3.0/libevent-2.1.12-fkdkuzspobgz3v723gd3ne7sbugwuziv/include -I/usr/local/include -I/usr/local/include  -O3 -DNDEBUG -finline-functions -fno-strict-aliasing -pthread -MT monitoring_test.o -MD -MP -MF $depbase.Tpo -c -o monitoring_test.o monitoring_test.c &&\
mv -f $depbase.Tpo $depbase.Po
depbase=`echo test_pvar_access.o | sed 's|[^/]*$|.deps/&|;s|\.o$||'`;\
/projects/tools/programs/ubuntu-20.04/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/gcc -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -I. -I../../opal/include -I../../ompi/include -I../../oshmem/include -I../../opal/mca/hwloc/hwloc201/hwloc/include/private/autogen -I../../opal/mca/hwloc/hwloc201/hwloc/include/hwloc/autogen -I../../ompi/mpiext/cuda/c   -I../.. -I../../orte/include   -I/projects/tools/programs/ubuntu-20.04/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-broadwell/gcc-9.3.0/zlib-1.2.11-cvyc3qqfhojs42texnulwmarnnkyjdvc/include   -I/projects/tools/programs/ubuntu-20.04/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-broadwell/gcc-9.3.0/hwloc-2.5.0-mgf2pgiusiwz5xzwqpqctlqwowwj6awq/include  -I/projects/tools/programs/ubuntu-20.04/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-broadwell/gcc-9.3.0/libevent-2.1.12-fkdkuzspobgz3v723gd3ne7sbugwuziv/include -I/usr/local/include -I/usr/local/include  -O3 -DNDEBUG -finline-functions -fno-strict-aliasing -pthread -MT test_pvar_access.o -MD -MP -MF $depbase.Tpo -c -o test_pvar_access.o test_pvar_access.c &&\
mv -f $depbase.Tpo $depbase.Po

/projects/tools/programs/ubuntu-20.04/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/gcc -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -I. -I../../opal/include -I../../ompi/include -I../../oshmem/include -I../../opal/mca/hwloc/hwloc201/hwloc/include/private/autogen -I../../opal/mca/hwloc/hwloc201/hwloc/include/hwloc/autogen -I../../ompi/mpiext/cuda/c   -I../.. -I../../orte/include   -I/projects/tools/programs/ubuntu-20.04/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-broadwell/gcc-9.3.0/zlib-1.2.11-cvyc3qqfhojs42texnulwmarnnkyjdvc/include   -I/projects/tools/programs/ubuntu-20.04/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-broadwell/gcc-9.3.0/hwloc-2.5.0-mgf2pgiusiwz5xzwqpqctlqwowwj6awq/include  -I/projects/tools/programs/ubuntu-20.04/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-broadwell/gcc-9.3.0/libevent-2.1.12-fkdkuzspobgz3v723gd3ne7sbugwuziv/include -I/usr/local/include -I/usr/local/include  -O3 -DNDEBUG -finline-functions -fno-strict-aliasing -pthread -MT test_overhead.o -MD -MP -MF $depbase.Tpo -c -o test_overhead.o test_overhead.c &&\

mv -f $depbase.Tpo $depbase.Po

/projects/tools/programs/ubuntu-20.04/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/gcc -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -I. -I../../opal/include -I../../ompi/include -I../../oshmem/include -I../../opal/mca/hwloc/hwloc201/hwloc/include/private/autogen -I../../opal/mca/hwloc/hwloc201/hwloc/include/hwloc/autogen -I../../ompi/mpiext/cuda/c   -I../.. -I../../orte/include   -I/projects/tools/programs/ubuntu-20.04/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-broadwell/gcc-9.3.0/zlib-1.2.11-cvyc3qqfhojs42texnulwmarnnkyjdvc/include   -I/projects/tools/programs/ubuntu-20.04/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-broadwell/gcc-9.3.0/hwloc-2.5.0-mgf2pgiusiwz5xzwqpqctlqwowwj6awq/include  -I/projects/tools/programs/ubuntu-20.04/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-broadwell/gcc-9.3.0/libevent-2.1.12-fkdkuzspobgz3v723gd3ne7sbugwuziv/include -I/usr/local/include -I/usr/local/include  -O3 -DNDEBUG -finline-functions -fno-strict-aliasing -pthread -MT example_reduce_count.o -MD -MP -MF $depbase.Tpo -c -o example_reduce_count.o example_reduce_count.c &&\
```
